Alicia, Graduated Mathematics BSc student 2022 Our three-year single honours course provides a broad education in mathematics and abiliity to specialise. Develop key analytical and problem-solving skills sought after by employers. The MMath is a four-year integrated masters qualification. In your final year you will select from a range of advanced optional modules and write a dissertation. In our four-year international study course, you will spend your third year studying at one of our partner institutions abroad. Study a broad and challenging curriculum in which you will develop and deepen your understanding of statistics and its applications. Deepen your understanding of mathematics and gain a substantial background in finance and business economics. The course offers a grounding in relevant mathematical concepts and techniques, combined with substantial degree-level studies in economics. Spend your third year working in industry to further develop your skills and enhance your employability.
